questions.question: Change the sentence to passive voice: 'The cat chased the mouse.'
options: The mouse was chased by the cat.
The mouse is chased by the cat.
The mouse has been chased by the cat.
questions.explanation: In passive voice, the object of the active sentence becomes the subject. 'The mouse was chased by the cat.'

questions.question: Change the sentence to active voice: 'The cake was baked by the chef.'
options: The chef bakes the cake.
The chef baked the cake.
The chef has baked the cake.
questions.explanation: In active voice, the subject performs the action. 'The chef baked the cake.'
